nodes.text: The 14th Sector Fleet was a part of the Galactic Empire's Navy active between 14 BBY and 4 ABY. Lieutenant Ralchio Nervi served in the sector fleet before coming to the attention of Grand Moff Ravik, governor of the Tolonda Oversector. Due to Ralchio's marriage to Lila Nervi from the influential Nervi family and Lila's lobbying to Ravik, Ralchio was promoted to the military rank of captain and became the commanding officer of his own naval task force prior to the Battle of Xorrn.
The 14th Sector Fleet was introduced in the 2016 Fantasy Flight Games adventure book Friends Like These as part of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
